title: How to sign up for PBE
body: Hello can anyone help me to sign ip for PBE?

replies.body:
Yup, you can sign up if you visit [**this page**](https://pbesignup.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe). You can also check the status of your PBE Application from this page, so be sure to bookmark it, if that's your thing.

Be sure to check out our [**PBE FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top) for details on how this system works. If you have any questions, let me know.
they give me error 500 evrytime i creat a account on pbe
That page says PBE signups closed!
